entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #108215
  • Cross-VM Exception Unwinding #108211
  • Test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.RemoteExecutor.RemoteExecutionException : Half-way through waiting for remote process. Memory load: 12 #108210
  • Add Support for Vector512 in BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness.cs #108204
  • DOTNET_DbgEnableMiniDump is set and the createdump binary does not exist #108202
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: warn when calling `GetType()` on a `System.Type` #108200
  • Vector128.WithElement codegen regression in .NET 9.0 #108197
  • Static readonly list not being enumerated in second foreach #108189
  • [mono] MonoAOT-llvm x64 crash inside `Perf_Regex_Common` microbenchmarks #108180
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 14 Regressions on 9/18/2024 11:52:02 PM #108203
  • [browser][WBT] Found existing build but it had failed. #108175
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 147 Regressions on 9/20/2024 7:38:18 PM #108201
  • [API Proposal]: Managed safe references #108173
  • .NET 9 Vector128.Min/Max performance regression #108168

Closed

  • Works in debug and exception in release mode with Sql Server SMO in IOS & Android #108160
    9.0.0
  • Crash in coreclr.dll!Debugger::SendException while processing stack overflow in x64 Windows #70755
    10.0.0
  • Equivalent for IgnoreIsSpecifiedMembers from Newtonsoft.Json #108195
  • [aot] mono_aot_split_options handles \ incorrectly #108066
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108126
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108121
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108128
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionContainerCycleTests.APostDependsOnBNone_ShouldNotThrow #108127
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.cmd #108123
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108177
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108129
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexPcre2Tests.IsMatchTests #108176
  • Test failure: win-arm64 checked/release asm diff #108170
    10.0.0
  • Results of sinh(−2 + 0i) and −sinh(2 + 0i) are not equal. #108196
    10.0.0
  • [Wasm] Satellite assemblies for localization are not used #107742
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.PfxIterationCountTests_X509Certificate2.Import_IterationCountLimitExceeded_ThrowsInAllottedTime #105609
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #108125
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: managed/Compilation/Compilation/Compilation.cmd #108124
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 RC 1 publish failed for WebAssembly AOT #107745
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback/Callback.cmd #108122
  • WASM test failing with OOM #100111
    10.0.0
  • [browser] `System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests` fails with out of memory #101436
    10.0.0
  • [browser][MT] PhysicalFileProviderTests test failure #104523
    10.0.0
  • Access violation with Native AOT when calling an abstract property #108154

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `field` references in property accessors #108219
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108218
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrame from `Delegate` construction #108217
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #108216
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108213
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108212
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108209
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix createdump 'stack smashing detected' error on arm64 #108208
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Support getting thread id in GC #108207
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Support for Vector512 in BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness (#108204) #108205
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix passing parameter to test added in #108190 #108199
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix fingerprinting and loadAllSatelliteResources=true #108198
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS] Enable and disable tests for hybrid globalization on Apple #108187
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • `WasmBuildTest` can exit with negative code #108181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove some implicit Helper Method Frames (HMF) #107648
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix createdump 'stack smashing detected' error on arm64 #108166
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve OOM kill message #108039
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve debugger StackOverflow handling #108172
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108067
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Misc cleanup of VM threading code #108171
    area-System.Threading
  • [WASI] disable part of HttpBuildThenRunThenPublish #108186
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Revert "JIT: Extend jump tables (#107831)" #108169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting and loadAllSatelliteResources=true #108190
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Add log profiler archive to (debug) runtime build #108185
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] bump wasmtime to 25.0.0 #108179
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Remove explicit dependency on System.Buffers from System.Formats.Asn1 #107679
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • Address failures for Import_IterationCountLimitExceeded_ThrowsInAllottedTime #108028
    area-System.Security
  • Use ExtractAsciiVector helpers in Base64Url #107823
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [browser] disable GetAsync_ServerNeedsAuthAndNoCredential_StatusCodeUnauthorized #108174
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove a lock contention test #108155
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107810
    documentation, area-Meta
  • InlineArray design spec/doc #108044
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Implement Enumerable.Reverse(TSource[]) #107957
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2545882 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #107591
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [no merge][interp] align check atomic ops on wasm #106963
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [WIP][NO-MERGE][infra] Try osx.1200.amd64.iphone.open queue #107923
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Initial bench #108099
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid NullReferenceException in CharEnumerator after calling Dispose #105296
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • remove dead code from BCL.cs #108165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43674
  • PackageReference grouping in centralized package management #43668
  • Dependency changes when building a self contained application in SDK version 8.0.303 to 8.0.401 #43653
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException Thrown by dotnet tool install #43651

PullRequests

Created

  • Support additional VS component IDs for workloads #43675
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve logging from agent #43672
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Always override RID in aspnetcore build, not SB-only #43667
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Exclude false positive license ref for fsharp patch #43657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #43646
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    untriaged, Area-Tools, DO NOT MERGE, Backport when open, 9.0.2xx
  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 9.0.2xx
  • Make the toolsResolverCache path overridable using an environment variable. Fixes #11432. #43576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2545965 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime, dotnet/aspnetcore and windowsdesktop codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support `ExperimentalAttribute.Message` #75221
  • Exception in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UseCollectionInitializer.CSharpUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer #75214

Closed

  • .NET 9 regression: Collection initializer with call to Span property results in System.InvalidOperationException: Unexpected value 'PropertyAccess' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundKind' #75222
  • duplicate language feature status #75144
  • Pattern matching an enum using an enum value following by using "with expression" on a record causes a compilation error #75074
    17.12
  • Microsoft.Cci.PdbWriter.GetAssemblyReferenceAlias throws Null Reference exception #74872
    17.12
  • Potential source breaking changes due to params collection #73857
    17.12
  • The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties #75218

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into features/field-keyword #75227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Move Quick Info content production to the Features layer and add Razor EA co-hosting APIs for Hover and Completion #75226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add option for LSP-based auto insert #75224
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Mark ISourceGenerator as obsolete for implementation #75223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75220
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Field-backed properties: interface properties #75219
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow <code> in DocComments to render as a block in Hover response #75215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collapse the rename UI when commit starts #75213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • docs: fix C# 13 proposal link #75207
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75156
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix null dereference in GetAssemblyReferenceAlias #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #74848
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual studio ignoring docker file #58064
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58054
  • FromAnywhere or FromRequest model binder #58053
  • Blazor RootComponent Dispose does not remove event handler for JS Interop #58051
    Backlog

Closed

  • Migrating .NET 7 to 8 with gRPC - The antiforgery token could not be decrypted #58059
  • [GB18030] There is an additional letter "j" when press the "Tab" key multiple times in a MVC project using Chinese characters as the project name. #57983
  • In Blazor WASM with with Open ID Connect how can you force an Auth/ID Token refresh #58058
  • Missing call to AddAuthorization() in Blazor Auto interactivity template #58039
  • How to run an async method when a property in a child control is changed? #57851
  • Blazor InteractiveServer APP:[PackageId].lib.module.js in RCL cannot reflect change #58050
  • [Blazor][net9] System.InvalidOperationException: Multiple constructors accepting all given argument types have been found in type 'Component'. There should only be one applicable constructor #58004
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https #58020
  • JsonOptions Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi formatting #57891

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #58065
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Stop using Mac 11 in Helix #58063
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Disable automated inter-branch merges #58061
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Mark API from 9 as shipped #58060
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Bump rollup from 4.18.1 to 4.22.4 #58049
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57942
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #57975
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Revert "Unquarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows" #58043
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add a note about when to validate ping payloads #57795
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • throw an exception on id.get if session is not available #57902
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Allow same version when updating versions in node packages #57921
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix up OpenAPI schema handling and support concurrent requests #58024
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57966
    Servicing-consider, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0.x
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [UITesting] Move ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to appium #24916
    Backlog
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fix DragAndDropBetweenLayouts to be more reliable #24914
    Backlog
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24913
    Backlog
  • [WebAuthenticator] [Android 14] The redirection does not work after authentication #24904
  • [Android] EdgeToEdge does not work for Modal page #24903
  • NullReferenceException with a platform-specific GestureRecognizer #24900
  • App crashes when sharing PDF with LaunchMode=SingleTop #24899
  • Failure to navigate to some pages on iOS and Mac Catalyst in 8.0.90 (works in 8.0.82, 8.0.40) #24897
  • [iOS] Freezing issue on loading #24895
  • Vertical ScrollBar is not visible until scrolled in Android platform. #24894
  • MAUI template missing in visual studio 2022 17.12 #24888

Closed

  • Rollback JSON file links are not accessible (Azure Pipeline is failing) #24892
  • Windows - Entry does not horizontally fill in 8.0.90 #24910
  • MAUI Blob RollBacks no longer publicly accessible #24909
  • ShellContent Title doesn't observe changes to bound properties #7453
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [9.0 Preview 7, Android and Windows] XamlC fails in Debug with _MauiForceXamlCForDebug but works in Release #24282
    9.0-rc2
  • Rollback JSON file links are not accessible (again) #24890
  • .NET 9: Runtime crashes when utilizing legacy libraries. #24740
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Carousel view Dynamic Height doesn't work. #24896
  • [BUG] Disabled Forced Dark Mode Xiaomi phones #24837
  • NavigationPage: BarBackgroundColor, BarTextColor and Title not updating #19859
    Backlog
  • Android app crashes while using Compatibility Relative Layout in .NET MAUI #24893
  • absence d,application #24885

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • [net9.0] Revert: Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate remote notification methods #24907
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    community ✨
  • [C] fix specificity comparison #24891
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • AppThemeBinding on ToolbarItems #24886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-menubar

Merged

  • 8.0.91 Release Branding #24915
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] [C] fix specificity comparison #24908
  • [housekeeping] Remove similar issues workflow #24911
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix ShellContent Title doesn't observe changes to bound properties #24806
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24898
    area-infrastructure
  • [tests] Comment out Shell test #24905
  • Avoid throwing in async void when applying relative source bindings #24780
    area-xaml
  • Fixed NavigationPage Title property #24781
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Revert "Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers" #24876

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • [Android] IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly when ItemsSource change #24717
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • [net9.0] Update rc2 versions #24877
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for the CollectionView to prevent duplicate groups or crashes when adding a new item to a group or when adding a new group. #24873
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` #24355
    community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, 9.0-rc2
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to extract projection logic into separate methods #34751
  • Using ToString() on a value object causes unnecesssary case expression in query #34750
  • Created query for projection with ownedMany and join is wrong and leads to null exception #34749
  • The SaveChanges can't track items created by Enumerable.Repeat #34747

Closed

  • custom migration name and support for undo #34748
  • Split query with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #34728
    9.0.0
  • SaveChangesAsync_accepts_changes_with_ConfigureAwait_true failed in C.I. #33489
    MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34746

Merged

  • Fix to #34728 - Split query with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #34742
  • [release/9.0] Disabling a flaky test #34744
    area-test, tell-mode

Updated

  • Make sort order consistent in split queries #34097
  • [release/9.0] Fix to #34728 - Split query with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #34743
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `installer/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #20132
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `installer/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #20131

Updated

  • [internal/8.0.1xx] Installer CI builds failing to find System.Diagnostics.EventLog with version (>= 8.0.1) #20142
